Package com.jscape.inet.mft.subsystems.audit.syslog

Class SyslogServiceDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jscape.inet.mft.management.descriptors.Configuration
      • com.jscape.inet.mft.management.descriptors.ServiceDescriptor
        • com.jscape.inet.mft.subsystems.audit.syslog.SyslogServiceDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jscape.util.db.IntVersioned, java.io.Serializable
    public class SyslogServiceDescriptor
extends ServiceDescriptor
    Syslog service descriptor. The service described by this descriptor takes responsibility for logging system events to Syslog server.
    Author:
    Roman Sheshunov
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • SyslogServiceDescriptor

        public SyslogServiceDescriptor​(java.lang.String host,
                               int port,
                               int facilityCode,
                               java.lang.String processName,
                               SyslogServiceDescriptor.FormatType formatType,
                               boolean enableTcp,
                               java.lang.String keyProvider)
        Creates a new Syslog descriptor instance.
        Parameters:
        host - the syslog server host
        port - the syslog server port
        facilityCode - the facility of the message
        processName - the process name
        enableTcp - check to switch between UDP and TCP
